values: Persuading, Pleading, and Predestination: Human Means in the Miracle of ConversionPersuading, Pleading, and Predestination: Human Means in the Miracle of Conversion

In his 2014 plenary message at T4G, John Piper preaches about the seeming tension between God’s sovereignty and human responsibility in all our efforts to convert the lost.In his 2014 plenary message at T4G, John Piper preaches about the seeming tension between God’s sovereignty and human responsibility in all our efforts to convert the lost.
